# Australia

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
aus.dat = readxl::read_xlsx("F00007577-WV6_data_Australia_2012_Excel_v20180912.xlsx")

# control variables
aus.dat$age = ifelse(aus.dat$`V242: Age` > 0, aus.dat$`V242: Age`, NA)
aus.dat$ethnic = ifelse(aus.dat$`V254: Ethnic group` == 101, 0, 1) # 0 as Australian/English speaking, 1 as others
aus.dat$gender = aus.dat$`V240: Sex`
aus.dat$edu = ifelse(aus.dat$`V248: Highest educational level attained` > 0, aus.dat$`V248: Highest educational level attained`, NA)

# DV: interested in politics
aus.dat$poli = ifelse(aus.dat$`V84: Interest in politics` > 0, aus.dat$`V84: Interest in politics`, NA)

# citizenship status
# aus.dat$citizen = ifelse(aus.dat$`V246: Respondent citizen` > 0, aus.dat$`V246: Respondent citizen`, NA)
aus.dat$citizen = aus.dat$`V246: Respondent citizen`
aus.dat.citizen = filter(aus.dat, citizen == 1)
aus.dat.immi = filter(aus.dat, citizen != 1)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# fit.citizen = lm(poli ~ age + ethnic + gender + edu, aus.data = aus.dat.citizen)
# summary(fit.citizen)
fit.aus.immi = lm(poli ~ age + ethnic + gender + edu, data = aus.dat.immi)
summary(fit.aus.immi)

aus.poli.mean = mean(na.omit(aus.dat.citizen$poli))
aus.dat.immi$poli.gap = aus.dat.immi$poli - aus.poli.mean

fit.aus.immi.gap = lm(poli.gap ~ age + ethnic + gender + edu, data = aus.dat.immi)
summary(fit.aus.immi.gap)
```
